entry.title: Recipe for a fun afternoon
entry.summary:
Ingredients
400 g milk chocolate 1 punnet of raspberries 1 tin of mandarin segments, drained 1 packet of sponge fingers 1 packet of marshmallows 1 DVD of Frozen 5 five-year-old girls 1 three-year-old boy
Equipment
Chocolate fondue maker TV DVD player Frozen karaoke tracks
Method Stir for three and a half hours.
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • 400 g milk chocolate
  • 1 punnet of raspberries
  • 1 tin of mandarin segments, drained
  • 1 packet of sponge fingers
  • 1 packet of marshmallows
  • 1 DVD of Frozen
  • 5 five-year-old girls
  • 1 three-year-old boy

Equipment

  • Chocolate fondue maker
  • TV
  • DVD player
  • Frozen karaoke tracks

Method

Stir for three and a half hours.
